title: Jujutsu Infinite | Jujutsu infinity | Game Wiki
slogan: Explore the Infinite Realm of Sorcerers
description: Dive into the world of Jujutsu Infinite (Jujutsu infinity) where players become sorcerers, battle cursed spirits, and interact with the anime universe.

HomeIframe.title: Jujutsu Infinite | Jujutsu infinity | Game Wiki
HomeIframe.description: Experience Jujutsu Infinite's dynamic gameplay with missions and challenges within a story-rich environment.

HomeFeatures.gameTitle: Jujutsu Infinite | Jujutsu infinity | Game Wiki Features
HomeFeatures.whatIsDescription: Jujutsu Infinite is a Roblox MMORPG that immerses players in a world inspired by Jujutsu Kaisen, offering character customization, combat with cursed spirits, and more.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep1: Customize your Jujutsu sorcerer with Innate Techniques.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep2: Complete missions and fight cursed spirits to level up.
HomeFeatures.howToPlayStep3: Engage in PvP and boss raids for rare rewards.
HomeFeatures.feature1Description: Customize your sorcerer with unique abilities and skills.
HomeFeatures.feature2Description: Immerse in rich narratives involving manga characters.
HomeFeatures.feature3Description: Team up to defeat powerful bosses for rare items.
HomeFeatures.feature4Description: Challenge other players to test your combat skills.
